programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.sub-title: Ihea 'Oe I Ka Wa a Ka Ua E Loku Ana?
programme.desc: When a list of undercover CIA agents is stolen, the team enlists the help of Magnum, Higgins, Rick and TC to get it back and protect national security; Higgins gives Tani some personal advice.

programme.title: Magnum
programme.desc: When Junior is kidnapped as leverage to retrieve the stolen list of undercover CIA agents, Tani and Quinn ask Magnum and Higgins for their help.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Abby's brother becomes the prime suspect when the passengers and crew of a private plane traveling from New Orleans are poisoned.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Special Agent Pride and the team investigate a Russian sleeper agent involved with Abby's brother; Sebastian goes to Washington, D.C., to work with Abby; Bishop drives all night to deliver a package and help the New Orleans team.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Abby is found in possession of a real bomb after her homeland security think tank is compromised; a theoretical terror playbook is stolen and is being auctioned on the black market.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: NCIS agents McGee and Torres head to New Orleans to partner with Pride and his team in the search for the missing homeland security theoretical terror playbook.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: More clues emerge about the fire that killed Shay, leading Severide to a former nemesis; Shay's sister visits; Cruz is faced with a surprise; Boden tries to help his father.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Antonio and his sister talk to Elliot Gish about the person they think is responsible for the fire that killed Shay; Lindsay has second thoughts about the task force; Platt's new, sunny demeanor results in curiosity.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Dawson and Casey face legal issues as they try to retain legal guardianship of Louie; Severide continues to look for a bone marrow procedure to help Anna; Brett opens up to Dawson.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Severide is brought in for questioning after it is discovered that his car has been involved in a deadly crash; Lindsay considers meeting her estranged father.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Fire and rescue are called when an old warehouse-turned-work space turns into a firestorm, trapping countless victims; the doctors and nurses of Chicago Med deal with a barrage of patients as victims of the disaster are brought through the doors.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Olinsky's daughter is in critical condition following a massive warehouse fire; Voight investigates the fire's potential origins; intelligence examines connections between the building owner, those who were inside, and potential arson suspects.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Chief Boden unwillingly agrees to let Dawson and Brett go under cover; Kidd and Zach's relationship hits a bump; Cruz has a hard time expressing his true feelings for Brett.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: A string of bombings is targeting members of the media; the team enlists firehouse 51 to help examine the devices and prevent the next attack.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: When Cruz's undercover work reveals a lead in a case tracking multiple robberies, the situation escalates quickly, causing friction between Voight's Intelligence Unit and the Chicago Fire Department.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A spate of robberies comes to light after a firehouse lockbox key goes missing; Sgt. Hank Voight suspects a firefighter may be involved, and with Boden's support, he recruits Cruz to go under cover to help sniff out any suspicious activity.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A series of teen opioid overdoses sees Severide partner with Sean Roman, but he begins to suspect there's more to the story than his old friend is telling him; Casey tries to be there for Brett as she considers her birth mother's offer to meet.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Intelligence searches for the dealer who caused multiple overdoses and is connected to Roman's missing sister; the case becomes a homicide investigation when they find the dealer's dead body.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: An apartment fire with connections to a rape and attempted murder leads to a joint investigation with the CPD and Sgt. Benson of the NYPD's Special Victims Unit; Dawson risks her life during a call.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: After arriving in Chicago to assist Voight and the team with a rape/murder case that has distinct similarities to a decade-old case from New York, Sgt. Benson asks Fin and Amaro to help; the prime suspect asks for a meeting with Lindsay.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Voight and members of the Chicago PD travel to New York to help SVU pursue Yates, their prime suspect in a rape/murder case.

programme.title: Tropical Heat
programme.desc: A man's gubernatorial aspirations are jeopardized when his son is accused of committing a rape. With Rob Stewart and Carolyn Dunn.

programme.title: Tropical Heat
programme.desc: Nick uses the expertise of a local tour-boat operator to investigate the murder of a fisherman who was part of a drug smuggling ring.

programme.title: Tropical Heat
programme.desc: Nick, presumed dead when he and his Jeep careen off a bridge while pursuing a criminal, finds himself in the care of an obsessed fan.

programme.title: Tropical Heat
programme.desc: Nick embarks on a strange murder case involving a young woman who discovers her entire body covered with elaborate tattoos.
